    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(UserSession us,
       Connection conn)
        Description copied from interface: UserSessionDAO
        Writes a new UserSession to the database.
        Specified by:
        add in interface UserSessionDAO
        Parameters:
        us - The UserSession to store
        conn - The Connection object to use. As many times user session management will be done in places where a valid request is not available, we cannot try to retrieve the conneciton from the thread local implementation.
        If any driver implementation of this method will not use a database ( eg, where a Connection is not required ), when just pass null as argument.
        See Also:
        UserSessionDAO.add(net.jforum.entities.UserSession, java.sql.Connection)

      • selectById

        public UserSession selectById(UserSession us,
                     Connection conn)
        Description copied from interface: UserSessionDAO
        Gets an UserSession from the database. The object passed as argument should at least have the user id in order to find the correct register.
        Specified by:
        selectById in interface UserSessionDAO
        Parameters:
        us - The complete UserSession object data
        conn - The Connection object to use. As many times user session management will be done in places where a valid request is not available, we cannot try to retrieve the conneciton from the thread local implementation.
        If any driver implementation of this method will not use a database ( eg, where a Connection is not required ), when just pass null as argument.
        Returns:
        UserSession
        See Also:
        UserSessionDAO.selectById(net.jforum.entities.UserSession, java.sql.Connection)
